subject: Baseball
NCAA Baseball Championships
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Joey Falcone, son of the former Mets pitcher Pete Falcone, led Columbia to its third N.C.A.A. baseball tournament, but his age, 26, could hinder his major league aspirations.
snippet: Joey Falcone, son of the former Mets pitcher Pete Falcone, led Columbia to its third N.C.A.A. baseball tournament, but his age, 26, could hinder his major league aspirations.
